content:
Hi implementors.

I want to relate DiagnosticReports to the larger studies they belong to. What's the best resource and reference link to use? I see there is a ResearchStudy but theres no relationship between DiagnosticReport and ResearchStudy which has me confused on how to implement this.

Any guidance on this would be much appreciated!
There's a standard extension that can link most resources to a ResearchStudy. (It's not on the resources themselves because it's not something supported by most systems)
